[[Image:Wyl Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Wyl on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Wyl''' is a castle in [[Dorne]], the region of [[Westeros]] controlled by [[House Martell]] of [[Sunspear]]. The castle is located south-west of [[Storm's End]] and is the northern-most castle to hold fealty to Sunspear.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/storms-end/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Storm's End entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Wyl is the seat of House Wyl. It is located near the northern end of the [[Boneway]]. House Wyl has tunneled beneath their castle to link caverns for greater defense.
